q: Bart Scott spoke for many when he talked about Ben Roethlisberger during conference championship week. "The respect we have for Ben Roethlisberger is that we don't look at him as a diva quarterback," said Bart Scott . We look at him as a football player. In this league, especially now, quarterbacks are treated pretty much like it's flag football. But he's one that's willing to take the hits and look down the barrel of a gun for his team. Tom Brady , Peyton Manning , Drew Brees , Michael Vick and Philip Rivers are all done for the season. Big Ben Roethlisberger is back in the Super Bowl. He's nothing like Aaron Rodgers . But he usually wins.

A Familiar User Experience' In announcing the online version, CEO Steve Ballmer said Dynamics CRM is an industry leader because it gives sales professionals a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, and streamlines processes and access to real-time data. The familiarity of the user experience is derived from the use of what Microsoft describes as a "next-generation native Microsoft Outlook client."
